name: Keter Storage Cabinet with Doors and Shelves for Laundry Room, Garage, Bathroom Accessories, Closet and Home Organization, White & Grey

LOCKABLE: Doors are lockable to keep contents safe; padlock not included

Note:-The assembled dimensions of this item are 25.5"D x 19.6"W x 72.6"H H inches. The measurements are determined based on the widest points so the width includes the handles of the cabinet as well as the feet on the bottom.
product_description: Garage organization isn't the easiest thing to achieve if you lack proper storage space. You could invest in various bins and shelves or get everything in one with the Keter Sparkle storage cabinet. It's tall to provide extra storage space, fits conveniently in most any area and is lockable to keep various items away from kids and others in the garage. It's also easy to assemble and requires low maintenance. In fact, you'll only need to wipe it down with soap and water if it's ever covered with dirt and dust. Organization Done Right with the Keter Storage Cabinet Whether you use it for extra linens for guests, towels in the laundry room or tools in the garage, the Keter Sparkle resin cabinet is the ideal storage solution. It has five storage shelves to help keep your items neat and organized. With its durable construction, it's perfect for use in areas like the patio and the garage.

name: Seville Classics UltraHD Solid Steel Rolling Lockable Metal Storage Cabinet Locker Organizer, w/Adjustable Shelves for Garage, Warehouse, Office, Classroom, Graphite, 36" W x 18" D x 72" H
short_description: Dimensions – 36” W X 18” D X 72” H (on Wheels)
LONG LASTING BUILD – Powder-coated solid steel construction for commercial-grade strength. Includes four corner bumpers for added protection.
PROTECTED STAINLESS STEEL – Features UltraGuard fingerprint-resistant coating on the stainless-steel doors.
SECURED LOCKING – The stainless-steel doors have a magnetic latch and feature a 3-point locking system. The locking system secures the top, middle, and base at once (two sets of keys included).
ADJUSTABLE SHELVES – Features four solid steel shelves; three that are height-adjustable (at 1-inch increments) and removable.
MOBILE DESIGN – Equipped with four 5” heavy-duty rubber wheels (2 locking) for convenient mobility.
WEIGHT CAPACITY – The total weight capacity is 600 lb. (150 lb. per shelf).
VERSATILE – Use the space-saving design in a garage, office, kitchen, bedroom, studio, laundry room, classroom, or warehouse.
product_description: Keep your items secured and organized with Seville Classics’ UltraHD Rolling Storage Cabinet. Safely store your belongings with our reliable 3-point locking system and never worry about missing items again. Just lock it and leave it with confidence. Easily adjust the height of the shelves to fit items of all shapes and sizes. Other fixed-shelf cabinets limit what you can store, while our flexible design lets you keep all your essentials in one place. Use the storage cabinet as a daily wardrobe closet, winter clothes storage, garage organizer, tool organizer, and much more. Feel at ease knowing your items are protected and organized in our commercial-grade solid steel cabinet.

name: Suncast Tall Storage Cabinet, Platinum Resin Outdoor & Garage Storage Cabinet with Doors & Shelves, Plastic, Weather-Resistant, Lockable, Freestanding Utility Closet for Tools & Supplies, Made in USA
short_description: WEATHER-RESISTANT & DURABLE. Made from heavy-duty resin that won’t rust or warp, this vertical indoor and outdoor storage cabinet is ideal for garages, basements, patios, laundry rooms, shops, or damp environments where wood or metal cabinets fail.

LOCKABLE FOR SAFETY. Our garage cabinets and storage system features padlock-ready doors so you can safely store cleaning products, tools, or chemicals away from kids and pets. Great locking storage cabinet with shelves for homes and utility areas.

CUSTOMIZABLE LARGE STORAGE CABINET WITH DOORS. Includes 3 fully adjustable shelves, each holding up to 75 lbs, this deep storage cabinet for organizing fits everything from bulky garden tools from outside to cleaning supplies with ease.
EASY TO ASSEMBLE, NO MOUNTING NEEDED. Assembles fast with basic tools. Freestanding vertical design of this garage storage system saves space in corners, no drilling or wall anchors required.

SLIM & VERSATILE DESIGN. At 72" tall and 30" wide, this two-door outdoor garden cabinet adds vertical storage without bulk. Ideal upright closet cabinet for garages, laundry rooms, pantries, covered decks and porches, and small business use.
product_description: Upgrade your home or workspace with the Suncast Tall Storage Cabinet, an ideal solution for smart storage ideas for garage, laundry, or outdoor spaces. Designed to maximize vertical space while minimizing floor usage, this weather-resistant plastic pantry cabinet offers outstanding versatility. Whether you're outfitting laundry room cabinet systems or setting up garage organization cabinets, this outdoor storage unit provides secure, durable storage with a sleek platinum finish. Its freestanding, heavy-duty resin construction makes it a superior alternative to metal or wooden cabinets that can rust or warp. Perfect as a utility cabinet for laundry room organization and storage, this exterior storage cabinet features three fully adjustable shelves, each supporting up to 75 lbs. It easily adapts to your needs and store everything from paint cans to paper towels, gardening tools to sports gear. With no wall mounting required, this plastic pantry assembles quickly and stays stable, even in humid or dusty environments. The padlock-ready doors offer peace of mind when storing tools, chemicals, or cleaning supplies, ideal for families, DIYers, and small businesses alike. Whether you're organizing a utility room, adding storage to your porch, or decluttering the garage, the Suncast Tall Storage Cabinet delivers a flexible, low-maintenance solution made right here in the USA."

name: Suncast Base Storage Cabinet for Garage Organization, 9 Cu. Ft. Capacity, Platinum Metallic & Slate - Lockable Multi-Wall 2-Shelf Resin Organizer for Garden Supplies, Paint Cans & Outdoor Tools
short_description: Resin

Organize your garage or workshop with the Suncast Base Storage Cabinet. Designed to keep your space tidy and your tool collection accessible, this cabinet is a perfect blend of style and functionality. The multi-wall resin panels are engineered for added strength to withstand the demands of any busy environment.

The generous capacity of 9 cubic feet provides ample space for a wide range of items, from gardening supplies to cleaning essentials like a handheld broom, spray mop, or even a compact holder for smaller gears. The two reinforced shelves inside can each support up to 75 lbs. of heavier items without sagging. Whether you're organizing your basement or upgrading from mounted units, this freestanding organizer has you covered.

The weather-resistant resin construction resists dents, rust, and rotting, providing an easy-to-clean, low-maintenance solution. Its Platinum Metallic body is complemented by a Slate-colored ceiling roof and floor, creating a modern look that fits seamlessly into any home setting.

Measuring 2 ft. 6 in. wide by 1 ft. 8.25 in. deep by 3 ft. high, this cabinet fits neatly into smaller spaces and easily tucks beneath overhead shelving or workbenches. Designed for convenience, there’s no need to mount it. The double door feature is pad-lockable (lock not included) with upper and lower latches to keep your items locked and secure at all times.

This heavy duty cabinet offers a practical alternative to open shelving or a hanging system with wall hooks in a large shed or mudroom. It’s also a great fit for the washroom or utility room near the kitchen, where it can serve as a laundry closet or overflow pantry for storing detergent and packs of hanger for your drying rack or clothesline.

The durable construction and thoughtful design of the Suncast Base Storage Cabinet provide a reliable storage solution that fits seamlessly into various spaces, helping you maintain an orderly and efficient environment.
